title: A.R.E.S.Extinction.Agenda.EX-SKIDROW
description:
S  K  I  D  R  O  W                     
                              
                                                             
                        proudly presents                        
          A.R.E.S. Extinction Agenda EX (c) ORiGO GAMES               
                                                                      
                                                                       
     22-10-2014......Release Date <-> Protection.................Steam    
     Action.............Game Type <-> Disk(s)....................1 DVD    
                                                                          
 RELEASE NOTES
                                                                          
  A.R.E.S. Extinction Agenda EX is the upgraded version of A.R.E.S.       
  Extinction Agenda, the award-winning 2.5D action-packed side-scrolling  
  platform game that originally released in 2011.                         
                                                                          
                                                                     
  INSTALL NOTES             
                                                                          
  1. Unpack the release                                                   
  2. Mount or burn image                                                  
  3. Install                                                              
  4. Copy everything from the SKIDROW folder into the game installation   
  5. Block the game in your firewall and mark our cracked content as      
     secure/trusted in your antivirus program                             
  6. Play the game                                                        
  7. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!
